headline.main: ALL-OUT WAR SET; Allies Plan to Retake Manchuria, Formosa and Seized Islands

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Dec. 1 -- What might be termed a Pacific Charter, outlining a specific program for obtaining the unconditional surrender of Japan and her reduction to her frontiers before 1895 with the ensuing liberation of her vast Asiatic mainland and Pacific island empire, was published tonight following a sensational five-day series of conferences among President Roosevelt, Prime Minister Churchill and Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek and their principal military and political staffs.
abstract: Group por of Cairo conf principals
